Question
========

A *sampling distribution* is always a

Answerlist
----------

* Discrete distribution
* Probability distribution
* Normal distribution

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Discrete distribution: Incorrect
* Probability distribution: Correct
* Normal distribution: Incorrect
